import axios from 'axios' import React, {useState} from 'react' function App() { const [data,setData] = useState({}) const [location, setLocation] = useState ('') const url = `https://api.openweathermap.org/data/2.5/weather?q=${location}&appid=895284fb2d2c50a520ea537456963d9c` const searchLocation = () => { axios.get(url).then((response) =>{ setData(response.data) console.log }) } return (

Nairobi Kenya

); } export default App;
